solution_line_template: He sold an average of {avg_books_per_month} books per month across all {months} months so he must have sold a total of {months}*{avg_books_per_month} = <<{avg_books_per_month}*{months}={total_books}>>{total_books} books in those {months} months
He sold {jan_books}+{feb_books} = <<{jan_books}+{feb_books}={jan_feb_books}>>{jan_feb_books} in January and February
He must have sold {total_books}-{jan_feb_books} = <<{total_books}-{jan_feb_books}={march_books}>>{march_books} books in March
